text:
Tied it up with a dunk! A round of applause for our Drag x Drive competitors 
 
Day 1 of Nintendo Treehouse: Live | Nintendo Switch 2 continues: https://ninten.do/6015qSNoV

Hey Nintendo,

Drop the price.

We won't buy your games for $70-$90.

We won't buy your upgrade packs for games we already bought.

I’m sorry but this game doesn’t look like a Nintendo game to me. Why is it so colorless?? What happened to making characters? This could’ve been as appealing as arms was back in the switch launch if it had livelier environments and characters.
I think I downloaded the wrong Rocket League

No one on earth wants to play handicapped basketball with an awkward skinny, vertical mouse. It's impossible to think that an already stupid, half of a misshapen controller should have mouse functionality, and you should pretend to be disabled! MAXIMUM STUPIDITY!
This is what you’re deciding to release with the Switch 2? Really? Glad Ryujinx exists…
What in the actual a** I'm seeing....

You'd think the physically-disabled community would rally around this game, but I barely see anyone talking about it at all.
A gloomy, wheelchair-themed game… wow, what a thrill. This was Nintendo’s big idea? I can totally see where all the creative energy went—straight into figuring out the price tag.
An arms 2 would of been cool , but this seems fun . Yaaaaay wheel chair battle !!!!
Imagine if the Switch 2 Camera puts your face on the wheelchair users.
Can't get my head around the poor art direction in this game? What were you thinking??

This looks like soulless, shovelled-out garbage, Nintendo! Who came up with the character designs and visuals for this? An indie team to make something more impressive in Unity in a week--like literally! Where is your world-class artistry and creativity here!
Call me crazy but I want to play this damn game. I just wish there was some kind of campaign mode! I need unlockables/story/quests SOMETHING other than just 3v3.
This game looks like it's a lot of fun!

No drop the price.
No raise the price.
YES to Drag x Drive League!

Remove the upgrade pack cost (anyone running an old game on Switch 2 should enjoy the benefits of the new console FREE)! The welcome demo game to display the consoles features should be FREE on the eshop! Also, screenshare on GameChat is laggyy, is that going to be improved???
